column1: sowndarya s wrote a review Apr 2018
column6: Good experience even though delays in flight arrivals and departures
column7: We were going for a holidag to kerela and booked air india flight. But Flight was delayed 30.mins.. i was bit upset as this 30 mins delay will impact my entire holiday... but as soon as i am in yhe flight.. gradually i forgot about the delay as the service was good, breakfast was yummy, no noise and the travel went smooth and peaceful. Had a nice experience over all

The dry tomato and cucumber sandwich was a sad apology of a light refreshment when I flew from Mumbai to Goa byAir India.I travelled first class on the return journey (from Goa to Mumbai) and the food was no better. Small consolation: the air hostess was helpful, and the ground staff at the airport in Goa was extremely efficient.

column4:

column5:

Business Class
column7: Pretty good VFM but room for improvement compared to other Airlines Business Class. Cabin crew on return trip were far better than those on the way out. Attentive and helpful. On the way out they couldn't wait to turn off the lights and take a break even though it was a late morning flight. Found check in staff to be a little on the miserable side too. Did a 3 flight trip. Heathrow to Delhi then on to Pune. Then Mumbai back to London. They were the same at each airport

I have been flying with Air India for most of my trips to India over the last 12 years. When I have changed to another airline to save a few euros, as I did 2 years ago, the need to change planes between France and India, and the less suitable timings made me come running back to Air India last year and this year. The staff are always friendly and helpful, and as yet I haven't experienced any delays. A 5 star airline !!

Returned home to Australia from Delhi last weekend.
On checking in the man at the counter told us that my wife and I couldn't sit together as we were one of the last to check in and there were no two seats together left. He lied.
Asked to speak to his superior and when she came over, he spoke to her briefly in Indian, then she lied. Asked to book an exit row, told all taken, they lied. Asked to upgrade to business, told all sold, they lied.
On boarding the plane we arranged a swap ourselves with another passenger so we could sit together.
On a 12 hour flight, the on board staff, do not consider cleaning the toilets part of their job. By the halfway mark, the toilets were an absolute disgrace. By landing time they were absolutely disgusting. Watched a stewardess kick rubbish into a corner, rather than pick it up.
On landing, the flight was also delayed almost two hours, we were left standing in the aisles for 15 minutes before being told to sit back in our seats, no particular reason gone. Apprarently the plane was supposed to be fumigated before passengers boarded in Delhi, not done. It took an hour before we were allowed to disembark.
It took another hour to collect baggage.
We will never fly with Air India again, and warn anyone thinking of using them, especially if you are Caucasian to reconsider.

column1: SHILPI K wrote a review Apr 2018
column7: felt like travelling with family airline.Seats are very comfortable and food served is pure desi( indian dish)

column1: John T wrote a review Apr 2018
column6: Only when no other seats available
column7:
Staff in Delhi lazy and uninterested. The meal on the flight was dreadful a cabbage and mayo sandwich. When my wife complained the attendant told her they give second rate on short haul flights.

I was hussled by the wheel chair guy for 500 rupees My wife kicked his .......

Dhaka to Kolkata, the flight was not bad. The inflight meal was good however the atmosphere on the aeroplane felt like everyone was sick. Nevertheless, I recommend passengers to fly air India on this dhaka to Kolkata route. Thank you.

column1: Ishtiaq A wrote a review Apr 2018
column7:
Air india is the largest Commercial flight operator in INDIA.
Overall my experience with this airliner very good.
On time flight. Food was ok as well.
Air creq behavior was good.
Very crowded flight.

column1: Deepa S wrote a review Apr 2018
column6: best In-cabin service provider with in India
column7:
I traveled with this airline so many time. My review is not just about the one trip
its about an overall experience which i feel with in all the trips.
Air India comfort level is really good, provides the largest leg room , its food quality is really good and enough for one time meal, cabin crew hospitality should be applauded.

column1: Keval V wrote a review Apr 2018
column6: Comfortable Domestic Flight - Air India - Mumbai Goa
column7: Online check in was a pain as we were flying as a family of four (2 minor kids) and the airline website only offered us different seats in all four directions!! When the check in official was approached at the airport he too offered the same!! All explanation of travelling with minor kids aged 4 and 7 was in vein :( Finally, I had to pay more and upgrade to Business class so that we can travel together with kids. Flight experience was ok.

column1: Hemant B wrote a review Apr 2018
column7: The comfort level , courteous service , food & beverage quality has greatly improved. There is still scope to do better but moving in right direction.

column1: Arbab A wrote a review Apr 2018
column7:
Flight On time, but inside flight service is not good, Cabin Crue member is not supportive,
or helping traveller of Economy Class, Also Flight Seating Space not Spacious and comfortable for long journey travellers.

column1: John S wrote a review Apr 2018
column6: A short but comfortable internal flight
column7: This was only a short 1 hour flight and my first time with Air India. I was impressed by the courteous welcome on board and the comfort of the seats. It seemed as though many other passengers were careless about where they sat in relation to their allocated seats and this resulted in a lot of milling around before take off. Seat allocation for our party of 4 placed us all well apart. A snack box with sandwich and drink was provided which was adequate for such a short flight. Departure and arrival was fairly punctual. The same applies to our return to Hyderabad on Flight AI 951 eleven days later

After mediocre service last year on BA to Kochi,we decided to try Air India. Boy were we pleasantly surprised!!! Not only were AirIndia cheaper for the return journey, but the service was fantastic!!!! The staff were friendly, courteous,and professional.the food was great,our bags arrived in tact, and all four flights left on time.
Could not have asked for a better service! We will definitely fly Air India again!
Over all an enjoyable flight. Services offered by the carrier was OK. Seats are more comfortable than budget airlines which really make a difference over long haul flight.

column6: Poor customer service for a great airline.
column7:
I was travelling from Hyderabad to Delhi to catch a connecting train from Delhi towards Jammu on the same night. My parents were travelling from Kolkata on train till Jammu. They are above 70 years and though medically fit, they still need assistance with their luggage and stuffs.

My flight was scheduled from Hyderabad at 4:30 pm and I reached well ahead. I went through all the boarding & security procedures. However, when we reached the boarding gate, we were informed that the flight has been cancelled. I was in total loss of thoughts since I had a train connecting from Delhi at 9pm which I had to catch to meet my parents.

The AI staff at boarding gates were clueless and did not know what to be done. The passengers had to be escorted back to the AI airport check-in counters. They informed that they will be able to accomodate us at 9:30 flight as the next flight at 7:30 was full. I repeatedly requested at all levels to arrange for an earlier flight since I had to meet my parents to support. All they could reason was that they can connect me to Delhi at their convenient flight.

I asked for a compensation since I will have to book a flight now next day till Srinagar and also stay over at Delhi in the night. However, they refused to accommodate any request. I had to shell out extra for no mistake of mine and I had to keep my old parents stranded. Unfortunate that a national airline doesn't bother about their passengers in distress.

I was so mentally stressed, I couldn't vent any further and match their rudeness.

column6: Even 2 hours before you cant select seat, and even boarding counter cant edit your middle worse system alloted seats
column7: Even 2 hours before you cant select seat, and even boarding counter person cant edit your middle worse system alloted seats. Earlier you could web check in 48 hours before and select seats, but if you web check in, system allot you all middle B & E seats, we were four, even elderly and all were scattered at B & E, and even at check in counter, he said, his power to edit has been removed and all seats are paid and he was not even aware, how much time before take off, these seats become free. This is worst experience.

column1: Nerissa A wrote a review Apr 2018
column6: Flight was on time and smooth
column7: It was a really early in the morning flight, but everything went smoothly. While the flight took off a little late it made up time and reached the destination on time.
This was my first flight with Air India, I found it to be very satisfying. Aircraft was 787 Dreamliner, very clean, crew was courteous, food was excellent and flight was dot on time.

column6: Comfortable seats, poor food, timely, poor staff service
column7:
AI 330 from Bom to Bkk. Flight was very much on time. Dreamliner with comfort seats with nice width and legspace.

As flight is late hours (1:40am), it is expected that service of drinks and supper start early. But it took more than 40 minutes after takeoff to start the same.

Food was wraps and tasteless. They served Ballantine, nice scotch. Luckily the guy serving us was smiling but rest were not that lucky.
Entertainment does comprise of big selection but very poor sound. In fact ear phone jack was needed to be held if you wish to hear. So I left.

Landing was on time and smooth
Well maintained aircraft with good services. Nice and comfortable journey overall. Flight attendants are not very helpful, that's the only negative.

The booking was made through a third-party agent but seat reservations were made directly with Air India afterwards. The outbound flight from Madrid to Kathmandu via Delhi went off without any issues and we were allocated the seats as booked. The in flight service was acceptable but nothing fancy and the drink choices from the bar were very limited. This can't be said for the return journey however. When we arrived to check in for the return flight from Delhi to Madrid, we were given boarding passes with completely different seats to the ones reserved, one of us being in row 26 and the other in row 35. I immediately showed the agent the email I had received from Air India confirming my seat numbers but was told that this was merely a request and that the flight had been over-booked and all previous seating allocations had been changed. After a massive argument involving the check in supervisors we were given two seats together next to the emergency exit and the usual seating supplement was waived. Many other families were having the same kind of issues at the check in desks and it was causing havoc and big delays. When we boarded the flight I could immediately see that my seat was very tatty and the seat back would not go upright properly. This meant that the stewardesses kept coming and trying to straighten it during take off and landing and when serving meals. Not only this but I was unable to use my personal tv screen for the duration of the flight as the screen which lifted out from the seat would not lock into place. It was either a case of holding it up for the whole flight or doing without. Not a good experience at all and would probably try to avoid Air India in the future.

column6: Painful experience with Air Indian international flight
column7:
Me and my wife was travelling through Air India Express flight number XI-251 from Mumbai Airport to Sharjah Airport on 21st April, 2018 (Saturday night) Timing for flight was 23:40 (IST) and landing timing at Sharjah airport was 01:25 (Gulf 4:00). We landed at 8:15 at Sharjah airport, almost 7 hours delay. Me and wife were having office on Sunday and who could not be able to make out to reach office on time. In fact we took leave for that day, coz we reached home around 10:30 post immigration. We lost of particular day loss of pay and included with Friday & Saturday holiday also as loss without pay. Air India did not even offer for water to any passenger during whole delay.
I strongly recommend not to approach Air India Express at any cost. Even though you are ready to go through all this pain.
At first, Air India departed around 12:25 from Mumbai airport which was it self 1 hour delayed at departure. After almost 45-50 minutes fly, flight pilot announced that because of less petrol we have to fly back to Mumbai airport. Post announcement almost after 1:10 hrs fly we were back to Mumbai airport around 2:25 IST. We set in flight almost for an hour and many technicians came to check flight and were searching what was exactly error. By that time we all relies that there was some technical error and not related to petrol. Then 3:30 IST they allowed us transfer pass and again we moved to another gate to catch other flight. Some how they could able to manage another flight by 5:55 IST other flight. And finally, flights departed by 7:00 IST and which reached to Sharjah airport around 8:15 (GST 4:00). Really horrible experience we had ever. This was my second bad experience with Air India Express.

column1: Rhoda F wrote a review Apr 2018
column7: We flew from Mumbai to Goa and thought this was a domestic flight and took an Uber to the domestic terminal. This was unfortunately the wrong terminal and we had to get a taxi to International departures as it is not within walking distance. It was the middle of the night and security had big rifles at domestic departures which was quite intimidating. Security is excessive with three different checks-and no lighters are allowed in the luggage or hand luggage. Also keep powerbanks in your hand luggage and not checked luggage. The flight is one hour long and air India is ok. The ride was not too bumpy and touch down ok. We booked the tickets online on My Trip and had no issues. Online check -in opens 48 hours prior to departure. Returning to Mumbai we had to go to Daobolim airport. Be sure to use mosquito repellent as there are mosquitoes inside the terminal building. The airport also has limited food.

This was my first time with Air India. I was impressed with the services and crew members. Inflight meals are traditional fresh and tasty. There are screens on every seat.
Only one thing was disappointing that in domestic travel we don't get access to those screens.

In the check in counter I asked for Aisle seat in Emergency Row if possible. They said it is not available, then gave me 13 C, to my surprise Emergency seats were fully vacant, When I asked a crew member if I can sit there, she said I will have to talk to my senior. After consultation, she refused to me saying, it is not allowed, questioning for the reason, she said, there is no reason but you can sit there.

I did not want to make it as an issue, but I do not know the reason exactly, I am a frequent flier in this sector on this same flight for more than 50 times, but it is the first time it happened. Still I am wondering why is it so?

column7: Well i didnt know what to expect given the recent going ons with the national carrier. However i found thr flight extremely comfortable, courteous and knowledgeable staff, latest 787 dreamliner, and tasty food and excellant drinks. Only downer was lacksaidical approach of checkin... which was a bit of shambles

I think their seats are spacious compared to other local flights
Food though given free , the menu items were not attractive
Rest just sleep and reach your destination

column1: MANOAJ D KALAANI wrote a review Apr 2018
column7: I never expected our National carrier will be having such an low standard of service.Meals served uncooked and in paper box.Fligth to Kullu got cancelled,amount was to be refunded but till date no progress.... shows what a unprofessional behaviour a airline can have.
